description: React component for a report generation page with export functionalities (JSON, CSV, PDF), progress simulation, and logs.

methods.name: appendLog
methods.description: Appends a timestamped log message to the logs array.

methods.name: simulateSummary
methods.description: Generates a pseudo-random summary object with total, pass, fail, error counts, timestamp, and sample test cases.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the report generation simulation, updating progress and logs.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels the ongoing report generation simulation.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the report generation state and logs.

methods.name: exportJSON
methods.description: Exports the current summary and logs as a JSON file.

methods.name: exportCSV
methods.description: Exports the current summary and logs as a CSV file.

methods.name: exportPDF
methods.description: Exports the report as a PDF document with summary and logs.
